definition.name: Google Cloud Storage Cache
definition.description: Cache your workload to a Google Cloud Storage bucket
definition.author: MansaGroup

inputs.name: bucket
inputs.description: Name of the bucket to store the cache into

inputs.name: key
inputs.description: Key to use as cache identifier

inputs.name: restore-keys
inputs.description: Substitution keys to use when cache miss

outputs.name: cache-hit
outputs.description: Whether the cache was successfuly restored
